name: gatecrasher
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who goes to a party or other event when they have not been invited: The party was ruined by a couple of rowdy gatecrashers. There were at least forty people at the party, some of them gatecrashers. See
gatecrash
More examplesFewer examplesHe tried to bring dozens of gatecrashers to the party with him.Gatecrashers were evicted from the auditorium to jeers and whistles.The party spun out of control because of a gatecrasher.
